messages.messageBody:
That's great! Thanks for sharing it with us! My daughter wants the
music so she can play it on the piano.

Carolyn

KathrynJB@... wrote:

> Julian has given me permission to share the lyrics of his song with
> the list.
>
> Hello eagle, I am your brother
> For I have always loved you.
> The way you fly makes me feel so free.
> I want to fly with you and dance in the wind.
> All my life I have wanted to be like you
> The way you turn and dive, you are my dream.
> Please help me to fly in my mind
> To soar with you would be heaven.
> To learn to fly with you is my dream.
>
> Kathryn

messages.subject: Julian's Song (lyrics)
messages.msgSnippet: Julian has given me permission to share the lyrics of his song with the list. Hello eagle, I am your brother For I have always loved you. The way you fly makes
messages.messageBody:
Julian has given me permission to share the lyrics of his song with the list.

Hello eagle, I am your brother
For I have always loved you.
The way you fly makes me feel so free.
I want to fly with you and dance in the wind.
All my life I have wanted to be like you
The way you turn and dive, you are my dream.
Please help me to fly in my mind
To soar with you would be heaven.
To learn to fly with you is my dream.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
